title: Paterson Great Falls National Historical Park: Eating & Sleeping
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Eating & Sleeping             Eating & Sleeping       Eating The park is equipped with two picnic tables which are available on a first come, first served basis.  There is plenty of shady and grassy space to spread a blanket and enjoy a picnic.  Benches are also available. There are many local restaurants serving a variety of fare located within a 10-15 minute walking distance of the park.  Click here for more information. Click here for additional restaurants, both within walking distance, and within  a 15 minute drive. Sleeping Sleeping facilities are not available at the park, however there are lodging facilities close by.
